Text: Thank you so much for this, will you be releasing season 4? Top Rips :)

Thanks. If you can bare my slow connection you can download season 4 torrent (same quality) from http://thepiratebay.org/details.php?id=3430813
Please upload a higher quality (DVD directly?) for Frasier, all episodes. My children will love you so much.

All of these have a slight video problem. It is not easy to notice at first but about every minute it lightens to a pinkish filter over the whole image then darkens again. It looks similar to the way Paramount dvd's used to sometimes not mix with vcr's connected when playing dvd's. The macrovision copy protection is maybe the problem.
